mapper.select: SELECT M.MEMBER_CODE, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_PWD, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, M.MEMBER_ENROLLDATE, M.MEMBER_STATUS, M.MEMBER_CLASS, M.MEMBER_INTRODUCTION, M.MEMBER_AGE, M.MEMBER_JOB, M.MEMBER_PHONE, M.MEMBER_SMSCONFIRMATION, M.MEMBER_GENDER, L.LOCATION_NAME, F.FILES_CODE, F.FILES_BOARDTYPE, F.FILES_NAME, NL.NEEDLEVEL_LEVEL FROM MEMBER M JOIN LOCATION L ON(M.LOCATION_CODE = L.LOCATION_CODE) JOIN FILES F ON(M.MEMBER_CODE = F.MEMBER_CODE) JOIN NEED N ON(M.MEMBER_CODE = N.MEMBER_CODE) JOIN NEEDLEVEL NL ON(N.NEEDLEVEL_CODE = NL.NEEDLEVEL_CODE) WHERE M.MEMBER_CODE IN (SELECT MEMBER_CODE1 FROM FRIEND WHERE MEMBER_CODE2 = #{ member_Code }) OR M.MEMBER_CODE IN (SELECT MEMBER_CODE2 FROM FRIEND WHERE MEMBER_CODE1 = #{ member_Code }) AND M.MEMBER_STATUS = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MESSAGE (MESSAGE_CODE, SENDER_MESSAGE_CODE, RECEIVER_MESSAGE_CODE, MESSAGE_CONTENT, MESSAGE_STATUS, MESSAGE_TYPE, SEND_DATE) VALUES(SEQ_MESSAGE_MESSAGE_CODE.NEXTVAL, #{sender_message_code}, #{receiver_message_code}, #{message_content}, #{message_status}, #{message_type}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT MS.*, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME AS sender_nickName, F.FILES_NAME AS sender_img_name FROM MESSAGE MS JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.MEMBER_CODE = MS.SENDER_MESSAGE_CODE) JOIN FILES F ON(M.MEMBER_CODE = F.MEMBER_CODE) WHERE (SENDER_MESSAGE_CODE = #{sender_message_code} AND RECEIVER_MESSAGE_CODE = #{receiver_message_code}) OR (SENDER_MESSAGE_CODE = #{receiver_message_code} AND RECEIVER_MESSAGE_CODE = #{sender_message_code}) ORDER BY SEND_DATE

SELECT M.MEMBER_CODE, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_PWD, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, M.MEMBER_ENROLLDATE, M.MEMBER_STATUS, M.MEMBER_CLASS, M.MEMBER_INTRODUCTION, M.MEMBER_AGE, M.MEMBER_JOB, M.MEMBER_PHONE, M.MEMBER_SMSCONFIRMATION, M.MEMBER_GENDER, F.FILES_NAME FROM MEMBER M JOIN FILES F ON(M.MEMBER_CODE = F.MEMBER_CODE) WHERE M.MEMBER_CODE = #{member_Code}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MESSAGE WHERE RECEIVER_MESSAGE_CODE = #{member_Code} AND MESSAGE_STATUS = 0
SELECT FILES_NAME FROM FILES JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_CODE) WHERE FILES_BOARDTYPE = 0 AND MEMBER_NICKNAME = #{member_Nickname}
